$WmMPID_セリス,ch06_00_Celice_M_Normal,Face|$w0|This is where we'll have our final
battle. Even if this is just training, it
feels just as intense as the real thing.$k$pStay with me, Julia.$k$p$WmMPID_ユリア,ch06_03_Yuria_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Of course, Seliph. I'm here to aid you,
my lord brother.$k$p$Sbs1000|
